subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Fascinators, the small hats fastened with barrettes or headbands that are favored by young and stylish women in Britain, have been banned from the royal enclosure at Royal Ascot.
snippet: Fascinators, the small hats fastened with barrettes or headbands that are favored by young and stylish women in Britain, have been banned from the royal enclosure at Royal Ascot.
